name: Parascript
overview: Parascript, LLC provides image analysis and pattern recognition technology solutions in the United States. It offers an image analysis suite for decision quality in medical imaging, postal and payment automation, fraud detection, and forms processing operations; and intelligent recognition, payment automation processing, forms processing, fraud prevention, medical imaging, and postal automation solutions. The companyâ€™s solutions also include CheckPlus, which automates check courtesy amount and legal amount recognition, check number, payee block, and MICR lines, as well as verifies signature presence and locates payor blocks; CheckUsability that verifies the images quality and usability; SignatureXpert, which detects and verifies signatures on checks and other documents; SignatureOnline that detects frauds at point-of-sale; CheckStock, which detects counterfeit checks used for fraudulent activities; AccuDetect, a medical image analysis and processing algorithm; and AddressScript CM that provides a solution to automated address recognition. In addition, it provides AddressSelect, which validates and interprets addresses; AddressParcel that locates and recognizes addresses on the U.S. parcel images; AddressLocator, which locates address blocks in postal parcel images; AddressKey that automates manual data entry for address correction and verification; InMailRouter, which automates the reading and sorting of incoming mails, including letters, postcards, and flats; and StampVerify that automates the indicia location and detection on envelope images. Further, the company offers professional services, such as planning, implementation, training/educational, and support services. It serves various organizations, postal operators, and government and financial institutions. The company was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Boulder, Colorado.
